com.example.client.controller - 程序包 com.example.client.controller
 
com.example.client.model - 程序包 com.example.client.model
 
Config - com.example.client.model中的类
This class contains all the constants which will be used in all classes.
Config() - 类 的构造器com.example.client.model.Config
 
connectToHallServer() - 类 中的方法com.example.client.model.HallModel
After the socket and other tools are prepared, this method will do the first interaction communication with hall server, to exchange the identification, and also receive the initial hall information from it, which will be used by viewer once the player has signed in successfully.
Controller - com.example.client.controller中的类
This class is the controller part of the MVC design pattern, and it also completes the singletom design pattern, any viewer or model could get the instance of controller via the static method getController().
createSocket() - 类 中的方法com.example.client.model.HallModel
Create socket ,BufferedReader, and PrintWriter before all works, to avoid the scenario that these tools are used whiles they are not prepared.
